name: medstash
description: Self-hostable medical receipt storage system for HSA recordkeeping

scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w backend && npm run test:coverage -w frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m "chore: bump version to %s"

author: Shawn Hoffman
